<div class="title-box">
  <h1>Oracle Homework Assignment </h1>
</div>

<div class="textbox">
  <p>In this exploratory <a href="report.html">study</a>, we aim to investigate the frequency of hospitalizations over the past six months and explore potential associations with demographic factors, diabetes-related indicators, quality of life measures, and other health-related variables.</p>

  <p>Main Research Questions:</p>
  <ul>
    <li>Does diagnosed patients have larger frequency of hospitalizations?(EDA,PSM,NB regression, ZINB)</li>
    <li>Does Type 1 Diabetes patients have better medication adherence score? For Type 1 Diabetes patients, does higher MMAS lead to lower frequency of hospitalizations? (contingency table chi-square test, ZINB) </li>
    <li>For Type2 DB patients, how to predict the possibility of hospitalizations in 6 months? (LASSO)</li>
  
  </ul>


</div>
